quote: What good is power when you're too wise to use it?
author: Ursula K. Le Guin,  A Wizard of Earthsea

quote: A word after a word after a word is power.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Recognizing power in another does not diminish your own.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: Music is my higher power
author: Oliver James

quote: Never forget the power of love, but always forget the love of power.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Power is not found in muscles; power is found in the mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Once you understand how powerful you are within, you exponentially increase the power and potentiality of everything outside of you.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The power of thought is the light of knowledge, the power of will is the energy of character, the power of heart is love. Reason, love and power of will are perfections of man.
author: Ludwig Feuerbach,  The Essence of Christianity

quote: The power to change your life lies in the simplest of steps.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The power of God is with you at all times; through the activities of mind, senses, breathing, and emotions; and is constantly doing all the work using you as a mere instrument.
author: Anonymous,  Bhagavad Gita: El Canto del Senor

quote: With great power... comes great need to take a nap. Wake me up later.
author: Rick Riordan,  The Last Olympian

quote: I say to myself: "Who are you to measure infinite power?
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: There is no greater power than the one others do not believe you possess.
author: Luis Marques,  Book of Orion - Liber Aeternus

quote: I love power. But it is as an artist that I love it. I love it as a musician loves his violin, to draw out its sounds and chords and harmonies.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: It is said that power corrupts, but actually it's more true that power attracts the corruptible. The sane are usually attracted by other things than power.
author: David Brin

quote: He who knows how to use the power of love is the most powerful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Never underestimate your power to change yourself; never overestimate your power to change others.
author: Wayne W. Dyer

quote: I only want power so I can get books.
author: Eliezer Yudkowsky,  Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality

quote: To play safe, I prefer to accept only one type of power: the power of art over trash, the triumph of magic over the brute.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Believe there is a great power silently working all things for good, behave yourself and never mind the rest.
author: Beatrix Potter

quote: My powers are ordinary. Only my application brings me success.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Knowledge is power is time is money.
author: Robert Thier,  Storm and Silence

quote: Hats have power. Hats can change you into someone else.
author: Catherynne M. Valente,  The Girl Who Circumnavigated Fairyland in a Ship of Her Own Making

quote: A soul gives power to the mind; and the mind empowers the soul
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
author: Alice Walker

quote: I know nothing in the world that has as much power as a word. Sometimes I write one, and I look at it, until it begins to shine.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: You have been blessed with immeasurable power to make positive changes in your life.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Economic power is exercised by means of a positive, by offering men a reward, an incentive, a payment, a value; political power is exercised by means of a negative, by the threat of punishment, injury, imprisonment, destruction. The businessman's tool is values; the bureaucrat's tool is fear.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: The purpose of collecting so much information can only be power.
author: Nick Drake,  Nefertiti: The Book of the Dead

quote: Power does not corrupt. Fear corrupts... perhaps the fear of a loss of power.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Nothing can add more power to your life than concentrating all your energies on a limited set of targets.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: The most powerful force on earth is residing in your heart; it is your power of love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Power-lust is a weed that grows only in the vacant lots of an abandoned mind.
author: Ayn Rand,  Atlas Shrugged

quote: Love is my inner strength and my power.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Sometimes a symbol holds more power than the thing it represents. Like the symbol for Thing, the one I created that is confusing and abstract and makes people ask, What is that thing? And I always reply, “If you already knew, why did you ask?
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: The power of death signifies that this real world can only have a neutral image of life, that life's intimacy does not reveal it's dazzling consumption until the moment it gives out.
author: Georges Bataille,  Theory of Religion

quote: We were all born with a certain degree of power. The key to success is discovering this innate power and using it daily to deal with whatever challenges come our way.
author: Les Brown

quote: If you start identifying your inner self with the spirit of pure potentiality then you are aligning with the power that helps in the manifestation of all energy in the form of matter.
author: Stephen Richards,  Be First: Achieve Every Dream

quote: Art has the power to transform, to illuminate, to educate, inspire and motivate.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: God intended Earth. God intended the waters. God intended you and me. We were created in the image and the likeness of God; we are holograms, if you will. So the power, the presence, the energy is within you and me. The energy of God, as life, is within each of us.
author: Mary Manin Morrissey

quote: It is a common sentence that knowledge is power; but who hath duly considered or set forth the power of ignorance? Knowledge slowly builds up what ignorance in an hour pulls down.
author: George Eliot,  Daniel Deronda

quote: Never question the power of one! Throughout history it has been the actions of only one person who has in inspired the movement of change.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Today is the only day in which we have any power.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: I have no such powers. If I did I would be more merciful than God, believe me.
author: Mario Puzo,  The Godfather

quote: You‘ve been given the innate power to shape your life.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The universe is inside you; you are the cosmic power.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: But need alone is not enough to set power free: there must be knowledge.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin,  A Wizard of Earthsea

quote: We are at our most powerful the moment we no longer need to be powerful.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir
